languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} immediately inflicts bleeding (5) on an ally of their choice (including themselves). That ally gains a +{uip|Dodge|32206030daaf462e8fffbcf2e5e57dc0}% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +3 additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} ends for any reason.

traits.locale_text: Executioner immediately applies Bleed 5 to an ally (including self). Ally recevies a {uip|Dodge|32206030daaf462e8fffbcf2e5e57dc0} bonus to Dodge and 3 additional MP until the bleeding stops for any reason.

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} inflige inmediatamente hemorragia (5) a un aliado a su elección (o a sí mismo). Ese aliado gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +{uip|Dodge|32206030daaf462e8fffbcf2e5e57dc0} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} adicionales hasta que su {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} desaparezca por cualquier motivo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}は自分が選択した味方1体（自身を含む）に即座に出血(5)を与える。その味方は、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}が何らかの理由で終了するまで、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+{uip|Dodge|32206030daaf462e8fffbcf2e5e57dc0}%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}と追加{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+3を得る。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} immediately inflicts bleeding (5) on an ally of their choice (including themselves). traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}は自分が選択した味方1体（自身を含む）に即座に出血(5)を与える。その味方は、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}が何らかの理由で終了するまで、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+{uip|Dodge|32206030daaf462e8fffbcf2e5e57dc0}%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}と追加{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+3を得る。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}立刻对目标盟友（或自己）施加流血（5），目标盟友{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{uip|Dodge|32206030daaf462e8fffbcf2e5e57dc0}%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}，同时额外获得3点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果以任意方式结束为止。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} immediately inflicts bleeding (5) on an ally of their choice (including themselves). That ally gains a +{uip|Dodge|32206030daaf462e8fffbcf2e5e57dc0}% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +3 additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} ends for any reason.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}立刻对目标盟友（或自己）施加流血（5），目标盟友{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{uip|Dodge|32206030daaf462e8fffbcf2e5e57dc0}%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}，同时额外获得3点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果以任意方式结束为止。

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} belegt einen Verbünden seiner Wahl (oder sich selbst) sofort mit "Blutung" (5). Dieser Verbündete erhält einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +{uip|Dodge|32206030daaf462e8fffbcf2e5e57dc0} % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, bis {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} aus irgendeinem Grund endet.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} immediately inflicts bleeding (5) on an ally of their choice (including themselves). languages.text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} inflige immédiatement Saignement (5) à l'allié de son choix (incluant lui-même). L'allié gagne un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +{uip|Dodge|32206030daaf462e8fffbcf2e5e57dc0} % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} supplémentaires jusqu'à ce que l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} se dissipe.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Палач{/g} немедленно накладывает кровотечение (5) на союзника по своему выбору (при желании можно выбрать себя). Этот союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} +{uip|Dodge|32206030daaf462e8fffbcf2e5e57dc0}% и +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} дополнительно на время, пока на него действует {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}, seçtiği bir dost birim üzerinde (kendini de seçebilir) anında kanama (5) etkisi oluşturur. O dost birim, +%{uip|Dodge|32206030daaf462e8fffbcf2e5e57dc0} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} ve +3 ilave {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, herhangi bir sebeple {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} durana dek sürer.
